items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous fit with stretch and comfort
items.body: Gorgeous dress, fabulous fit looks and feels fantastic on. It is not itchy but comfy and I received many compliments from my friends and family. It is true to size but because itâ€™s stretchy the medium was too big so I recommend sizing down to a smaller size if you are between sizes. Read more
items.author: Josie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: My daughter loved the dress and she looked beautiful in it for her dance at school. It fit her perfectly and she was very comfortable in it and it still looked good on her when she came home that night no real wrinkles that I saw. Read more
items.author: Ann

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality but received the wrong color
items.body: Pretty dress, but I received the regular navy instead of the Glitter Navy that was listed on my receipt and in my order. Would have given 5 stars if the right color was sent. Overall, good quality and accurate size. Read more
items.author: Tamara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress
items.body: Amazing. I had to size down. I wear a medium. Had to send back to get the small. Got a lot of compliments. Very pretty and comfortable Read more
items.author: Dawn Venimiglia

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Glitter_black, Glitter_burgundy, Glitter_navy, Glitter_royalblue, Glitter_champagne, Glitter_green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
